definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: And of the Levites， Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God， and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孫中有亞希雅掌管神殿的府庫和聖物的府庫。

sentences.english: And of the Levites， Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God， and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孫中有亞希雅掌管神殿的府庫和聖物的府庫。

sentences.english: Any who had precious stones gave them to the treasury of the temple of the Lord in the custody of Jehiel the Gershonite.
sentences.chinese: 凡有寶石的都交給革順人耶歇，送入耶和華殿的府庫。

sentences.english: He sends lightning with the rain and brings out the wind from his storehouses.
sentences.chinese: 他造電隨雨而閃，從他府庫中帶出風來。

sentences.english: Is not this laid up in store with me, and sealed up among my treasures?
sentences.chinese: 這不都是積蓄在我這裏，封鎖在我府庫中嗎？

sentences.english: And Shebuel the son of Gershom, the son of Moses, was ruler of the treasures.
sentences.chinese: 摩西的孫子，革舜的兒子細布業掌管府庫。

sentences.english: Shubael, a descendant of Gershom son of Moses, was the officer in charge of the treasuries.
sentences.chinese: 摩西的孫子，革舜的兒子細布業掌管府庫。

sentences.english: And of the Levites, Ahijah had charge of the treasuries of the house of God and the treasuries of the dedicated gifts.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孫中有亞希雅掌管神殿的府庫和聖物的府庫。

sentences.english: And of the Levites, Ahijah had charge of the treasuries of the house of God and the treasuries of the dedicated gifts.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孫中有亞希雅掌管神殿的府庫和聖物的府庫。

sentences.english: That I may cause those that love me to inherit substance; and I will fill their treasures.
sentences.chinese: 使愛我的承受貨財，並充滿他們的府庫。

sentences.english: She shall fill all her house with her increase, and the storehouses with her treasures.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的寶物，貯滿他們的府庫。

sentences.english: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God, and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孫中有亞希雅掌管神殿的府庫和聖物的府庫。

sentences.english: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God, and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孫中有亞希雅掌管神殿的府庫和聖物的府庫。

sentences.english: Have I not kept this in reserve and sealed it in my vaults?
sentences.chinese: 這不都是積蓄在我這裏，封鎖在我府庫中麼。

sentences.english: And they with whom precious stones were found gave them to the treasure of the house of the LORD, by the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.
sentences.chinese: 凡有寶石的都交給革順人耶歇，送入耶和華殿的府庫。

sentences.english: This refers first to the rain. The LORD will give this in its season.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華必爲你開天上的府庫，按時降雨在你的地上。

definition: Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to die or be martyred for a noble cause/to be faithful unto death
to plan and consider/to reflect on one's best strategy
to be in overall charge/to oversee
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
